00020 #ifndef BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_MAGNITUDE_MANAGER_HPP
00021 #define BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_MAGNITUDE_MANAGER_HPP
00022 
00023 namespace boost {
00024 namespace xint {
00025 namespace detail {
00027 
00028 template <bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class Allocator>
00029 class magnitude_manager_t {
00030     public:
00031     typedef allocator_t<Bits, Secure, Allocator> Alloc;
00032 
00033     magnitude_manager_t(): raw_data(zerodata()) { inc(); }
00034     explicit magnitude_manager_t(std::size_t length, bool readonly = false):
00035         raw_data(Alloc::alloc(length, readonly)) { inc(); }
00036     magnitude_manager_t(const magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Allocator>
00037         &copy): raw_data(copy.raw_data) { inc(); }
00038     template <bitsize_t B, bool S, class A>
00039     magnitude_manager_t(const magnitude_manager_t<B, S, A> &copy):
00040         raw_data(copy.raw_data) { inc(); }
00041     ~magnitude_manager_t() { dec(); }
00042 
00043     magnitude_manager_t& operator=(const magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure,
00044         Allocator>& copy) { reset(copy.raw_data); return *this; }
00045 
00046     bool is_nan() const { return (raw_data == 0); }
00047     void make_nan() { dec(); raw_data = 0; }
00048 
00049     void resize_and_uniquify(std::size_t newsize = 0, realloc::strategy strategy
00050         = realloc::copy) { raw_data = Alloc::realloc_and_uniquify(raw_data,
00051         newsize, strategy); }
00052 
00053     bool same_storage(const magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Allocator> &n)
00054         const { return raw_data == n.raw_data; }
00055 
00056     // Do not call these on a NaN
00057     std::size_t max_length() const { return raw_data->max_length; }
00058     bool is_unique() const { return (raw_data->copies() == 1); }
00059     digit_t *digits() { return raw_data->digits; }
00060     const digit_t *digits() const { return raw_data->digits; }
00061     void trim() { fixedlength_t<Bits>::trim(raw_data); }
00062 
00063     void _swap(magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Allocator>& i2) {
00064         using std::swap;
00065         swap(raw_data, i2.raw_data);
00066     }
00067 
00068     private:
00069     static magnitude_t *zerodata() { static magnitude_manager_t z(1, true);
00070         return z.raw_data; }
00071 
00072     void reset(magnitude_t *p) { if (raw_data != p) { dec(); raw_data = p;
00073         inc(); } }
00074     void dec() { if (raw_data) Alloc::detach(raw_data); }
00075 
00076     #ifdef BOOST_XINT_USE_COW
00077         void inc() { if (raw_data) Alloc::attach(raw_data); }
00078     #else
00079         void inc() {
00080             if (!raw_data) return;
00081             Alloc::attach(raw_data);
00082             if (raw_data->copies() > 1 && !raw_data->readonly) {
00083                 // Copy-on-Write disabled, deep-copy it
00084                 resize_and_uniquify();
00085             }
00086         }
00087     #endif
00088 
00089     magnitude_t *raw_data;
00090 
00091     template <bitsize_t B, bool S, class A>
00092     friend class magnitude_manager_t;
00093 };
00094 
00095 template <bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class Allocator>
00096 void swap(magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Allocator>& p1,
00097     magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Allocator>& p2)
00098 {
00099     p1._swap(p2);
00100 }
00101 
00103 } // namespace detail
00104 } // namespace xint
00105 } // namespace boost
